description: I would have expected that the program recognises the build-in camera of my laptop automatically. It does not.
summary: Don't use if you expect scanning with computer's build-in camera

description: Wanted to generate QR codes and that's working perfectly. Didn't want to download 100 MB (or more!) for such a simple application.
summary: Exactly what I need right now
